message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is below my minimum. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product.
